abstract: George Zimmerman, Florida man acquitted in fatal shooting of black teenager Trayvon Martin in 2012, is arrested and charged with aggravated assault following incident in which he threw wine bottle at woman.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Zimmerman, who was acquitted in the Trayvon Martin killing two years ago, was charged with throwing a wine bottle at a woman at his home this week, according to the police in Lake Mary, Fla.
snippet: Mr. Zimmerman, who was acquitted in the Trayvon Martin killing two years ago, was charged with throwing a wine bottle at a woman at his home this week, according to the police in Lake Mary, Fla.

headline.main: George Zimmerman Is Charged With Assault in Florida
headline.print_headline: Zimmerman Is Charged With Assault in Florida
